attributes.action: Ban the fox hunt and better care for hounds.
attributes.additional_details: I and millions of other people are passionate about nature and its creatures. Hunting for sport or pleasure is cruel and in no way or form should be allowed. We are all herefor a reason and no one or anything should have to go through suffer and pain for nothing.
attributes.background: Pass a law to explicitly send to jail and keep a criminal record  for fox and other animal hunt. Seek prosecution.

rejection.details:
Under the Hunting Act 2004 fox hunting is already illegal.

Decisions about investigating and prosecuting alleged crimes are a matter for the police and Crown Prosecution Service, not the Government or Parliament.
